items.sentence: You still want to do that with Tom, don't you?
You still don't think Tom can do that, do you?
You still don't know why Tom did that, do you?
You shouldn't have told Tom that you did that.
You should tell Tom you won't do that anymore.
You should tell Tom you don't want to do that.
You should tell Tom you don't need to do that.
You should tell Tom you don't have to do that.
You should tell Tom that he shouldn't do that.
You should make sure that Tom does that today.
You should get Tom to tell you how to do that.
You should get Tom to show you how to do that.
You don't know what's going to happen, do you?
You don't know why Tom has to do that, do you?
You don't know why Tom didn't do that, do you?
You didn't tell Tom I had to do that, did you?
You didn't know Tom wouldn't do that, did you?
You didn't believe Tom would do that, did you?
You didn't believe Tom could do that, did you?
You asked Tom to help you do that, didn't you?
You asked Tom not to do that here, didn't you?
You asked Tom if he could do that, didn't you?
You'll likely lose some weight if you do that.
You'll go to the hospital tomorrow, won't you?
We're looking forward to seeing you in Boston.
We need to finish doing this before nightfall.
I'd like to have you over for dinner sometime.
The ring that Tom is wearing is very valuable.
I'm pretty sure that Tom's father is a lawyer.
Tom is pretty sure he's going to lose his job.
Tom is one of the brightest kids in the class.
Tom is now staying at his grandparent's house.
Tom is looking for somebody who speaks French.
Tom is sitting on the patio, waiting for Mary.
Tom is rereading the letters he got from Mary.
Tom says that he's ready to make some changes.
Tom said he was going to go skating with Mary.
Tom said he couldn't convince Mary to do that.
Tom needs to go to Boston to help his brother.
Tom is too much of a coward to go there alone.
Tom is the only person who thinks that's true.
Tom was in Boston the night Mary was murdered.
Tom was afraid to tell Mary what had happened.
Tom was actually skinny before he got married.
Tom tried to save Mary, but he wasn't able to.
Tom tried to convince Mary to stop doing that.
Tom started doing that before he was thirteen.
Tom spent all afternoon watching music videos.
Tom will be staying in Boston for the weekend.
Tom will be moving back to Boston next spring.
Tom was sound asleep when I left this morning.
Tom was really scared about what might happen.
Tom was in Boston when Mary committed suicide.
Tom yells at his computer whenever it crashes.
Tom will be visiting his in-laws next weekend.
Did you tell Tom I wasn't planning to be here?
Tom was sitting in an easy chair, watching TV.
Tom sat at the bar, just staring at his drink.
Tom has a picture of Mary on his bedroom wall.
Tom saw a picture of Mary hanging on the wall.
This is the most recent picture of Tom I have.
We just have to find Tom before the police do.
Tom lives in a small apartment on Park Street.
Tom doesn't want to make a big deal out of it.
Let's give Tom a chance to do the right thing.
I'm not sure what's wrong with Tom's computer.
What kind of gift are you planning to get Tom?
What we have to do is persuade Tom to help us.
Tom has been in love with you for a long time.
Tom hasn't yet said anything to me about that.
Tom spends a lot of time in his room studying.
The question is whether Tom will do it or not.
Tom lent me enough money to buy what I needed.
Tom was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.

Tom isn't the kind of guy who gives up easily.
Tom put the tranquilizer gun back in its case.
Tom made up his mind to ask Mary to marry him.
Do you think it could be the same Tom Jackson?
Tom and I'll be at the hospital visiting Mary.
Tom got down on one knee and proposed to Mary.
Tom should know better than to lend you money.
I saw Tom go into the store across the street.
Tom has been behind bars for a very long time.
Tom pushed open the door and entered the room.
Tom only lived with us for about three months.
Tom never seems to feel the cold the way I do.
